程序包 controller

类 DragController

java.lang.Object
controller.DragController
public class DragController
extends java.lang.Object
The controller for ViewDrag
版本:
final
作者:
Benny Li, Huawei Wang, Ruiheng Xie, Yuzu Wu

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    static void delete​(GardenImgView iv1copy, javafx.scene.layout.Pane pane)
    detector for an GardenImgView delete events, able to delete the image from both pane and Model
    static void drag​(GardenImgView iv1)
    detector for an GardenImgView drag events
    static void DragOver​(javafx.scene.layout.Pane flowpane)
    detector for an DragOver even from leftside to Middle Pane
    static void drop​(javafx.scene.layout.Pane pane)
    detector for an GardenImgView drop events
    static java.lang.String getName()  
    void handleMousePress​(javafx.event.Event event)
    Display Viewplants scene when the "back" button is clicked
    void handleMousePress2​(javafx.event.Event event)
    Display ViewRatings scene when the "next" button is clicked
    static void move​(GardenImgView iv1copy)
    detector for an GardenImgView move events
    static void setName​(java.lang.String name)
